DOC.brief_summary: This randomized trial compare electronic cigarette ( e-Cigarettes ) nicotine gum smoking cessation . Participants randomly assign either e-cigarette use nicotine gum use quit attempt . All participant one hour meeting tobacco treatment specialist develop quit plan set quit date . Quit status determine 12 week quit date . Continued use nicotine replacement ( either e-Cigarette nicotine gum ) satisfaction treatment assignment evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: e-Cigarettes Versus NRT Gum Smoking Cessation
DOC.criteria: Smokes least five cigarette per day No current previous regular use ecigarettes Ready quit smoking Use smokeless pipe tobacco Smoke 40 cigarette per day Pregnant breastfeeding Unable chew gum due dental jaw problem Myocardial infarction ( heart attack ) within previous 12 month Hypersensitivity propylene glycol nicotine gum
